text: A construction worker, K. Mariappan (56) of Second Street in Sundar Nagar, was killed in a wall collapse on Tuesday. According to police, he was engaged in digging the earth to lay the foundation for building a house for T. Vellapandi (50) of Gandhi Nagar, where the incident occurred. The mud wall of the neighbour’s house at the worksite collapsed on Mariappan while he was at work, sources said. He died on the way to the hospital. The body was taken to Thoothukudi Government Medical College Hospital for post mortem. Muthaiyapuram police are yet to file a case in connection with the incident.
title: Worker killed in wall collapse
